property.name: fs.s3a.impl
property.description: The implementation class of the S3A Filesystem

property.name: fs.s3a.threads.core
property.description: Number of core threads in the threadpool.

property.name: fs.s3a.multiobjectdelete.enable
property.description: When enabled, multiple single-object delete requests are replaced by a single 'delete multiple objects'-request, reducing the number of requests. Beware: legacy S3-compatible object stores might not support this request.

property.name: fs.s3a.threads.keepalivetime
property.description: Number of seconds a thread can be idle before being terminated.

property.name: fs.s3a.max.total.tasks
property.description: Number of (part)uploads allowed to the queue before blocking additional uploads.

property.name: fs.s3a.multipart.size
property.description: How big (in bytes) to split upload or copy operations up into. This also controls the partition size in renamed files, as rename() involves copying the source file(s)

property.name: fs.s3a.multipart.threshold
property.description: Threshold before uploads or copies use parallel multipart operations.
